name: Triceps Extensions on Cable
how_to_perform:
1. Start by standing in front of a cable machine with the cable at chest height, facing away from it.

2. Hold a handle attached to the end of both cables in each hand with your palms facing backward (away from you).

3. Press your arms fully straight at shoulder height and engage your core.

4. Slowly extend your arms further behind you, keeping them straight, until they are at full extension.

5. Pause briefly at the top of the movement.

6. Slowly lower your arms back to the starting position by bending your elbows.

7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, focusing on using your triceps to control the movement.

8. Throughout the exercise, ensure proper form and engagement in your core.
short_summary: Triceps extensions on a cable machine allow you to isolate and target your triceps effectively, improving strength and muscle growth through multiple repetitions.
